INSERT INTO PACT_DOC_FKXY (group_id,hos_id,copy_code,doc_id,pact_code,doc_type,doc_name,dept_id,dept_no,emp_id,location,file_path,pact_state)
select #{item.group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.doc_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.doc_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.doc_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dept_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.dept_no,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.emp_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.file_path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pact_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
